content.html: confused about cloud jargon? don't be, it's simple: serverless: app has servers, they're just owned by amazon multi-cloud: app is split over two different amazon accounts microservices: instead of amazon owning one of your big things, they own 100 of your little things (easier!)
content.value:
confused about cloud jargon? don't be, it's simple:

serverless: app has servers, they're just owned by amazon
multi-cloud: app is split over two different amazon accounts
microservices: instead of amazon owning one of your big things, they own 100 of your little things (easier!)
